Export.Routine:
WWWMANU #include COMSYS #define LogR(%1,%2) ; #define LogRx(%1) ; #define LogRm(%1) ; #;define LogR(%1,%2) $$$JournalOff s ^zzLogR($g(YBED,"UNK"),$i(^zzLogR))= %1_"^WWWMANU("_%2_") : "_$zh $$$JournalOn #;define LogRx(%1) $$$JournalOff s ^zzLogR($g(YBED,"UNK"),$i(^zzLogR))=%1 $$$JournalOn #;define LogRm(%1) $$$JournalOff m ^zzLogR($g(YBED,"UNK"),$i(^zzLogR))=%1 $$$JournalOn ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; Description of Function : ; MANUELLES PROGRAMM/DRUCKVORLAGE ; ; Inputs : ; ; ; ByRef : ; ; ; Returns : ; ; ; History : ; 07-May-2007 GRF SR15511: Doco; quits; naked references ; 30-May-2005 RPW SR12056: Attempt at Performance Increase ; 06.08.1997 DT (C) BY DITMAR TYBUSSEK ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- DO START QUIT START ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; History: ; 05-Nov-2007 shobby BR014748: Use standard check for password. ; 13-Apr-2006 JW Removed + from user id's in lock check ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NEW (%request,%session,%KEY,%,%ZCS,%CGIEVAR) DO ^WWWVAR SET $ZTRAP="^WWWERROR" IF '$DATA(^WWW013(0,YBED)) DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(5)) QUIT ;IF $$^WWWUPER($$^WWWPWDCHECK($PIECE(^WWW013(0,YBED,1),Y,2)))'=$$^WWWUPER(YPWD) DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(5)) QUIT ;BR014748 IF $zconvert($$^WWWPWDCHECK($PIECE(^WWW013(0,YBED,1),Y,2)),"U")'=$zconvert(YPWD,"U") DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(5)) QUIT ;BR014748 IF '$$CHECK^WWWPWDCHECK($PIECE(^WWW013(0,YBED,1),Y,2),YPWD) DO ^WWWINFO($$^WWWTEXT(5)) QUIT ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ;KILL LOCK IF $GET(YUSER)'="" SET YA="" FOR SET YA=$ORDER(^WWW006(0,YA)) QUIT:YA="" DO . IF +YA'=+$HOROLOG KILL ^WWW006(0,YA) QUIT ;LÖSCHEN ALTE LOCKFILE ;Delete . NEW YA1 ;LOSCHEN ALLE EINTRÄGE WENN LEERES FELD ;when field . IF $GET(YDATEI)'="" DO . . SET YA1="" . . FOR SET YA1=$ORDER(^WWW006(0,+$HOROLOG,YA1)) QUIT:YA1="" SET YA(1)=$GET(^WWW006(0,+$HOROLOG,YA1,1)) DO . . . IF $PIECE(YA(1),Y,1)=YUSER KILL ^WWW006(0,+$HOROLOG,YA1) KILL ^WWW0061(0,+$HOROLOG,YA1) ;FIS;19.04.04;LÖSCHEN LOCK RÜCKHOLINFO ;Delete KILL YA ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ DO PGMSTART QUIT PGMSTART ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ; EINSPRUNG MIT YEXEC UND YFORM ;by means of And ; ; Params: YEXEC = Execute String ; if "#" No HTML Preperation ; ; Returns: ; ; History: ; 19-Dec-2006 JW BR014262: Use GetType fn. ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------- $$$LogR("PGMSTART",$get(YEXEC)) ;IF '$FIND(YEXEC,"XML") IF '$FIND(YEXEC,"EDI") DO ;. IF YBEDBER=1 WRITE YCR,YCR,"",YCR,YCR SET %(YQUERY,"EP")="WWWMANU" ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ IF $FIND(YEXEC,"**class") SET YEXEC=$PIECE(YEXEC,"**class",1)_"##class"_$PIECE(YEXEC,"**class",2,9) IF $FIND(YEXEC,"**class") SET YEXEC=$PIECE(YEXEC,"**class",1)_"##class"_$PIECE(YEXEC,"**class",2,9) xecute $get(^SysSetup("TrackExecute","WWWMANU")) ;FIS;24760;18.12.03;PRÜFEN HTML-VORBEREITUNG DURCH INDIVIDUELLEN EXECUTE ;IN KLASSE WWWCHECKHTML KANN DEFINIERT WERDEN, OB BEI EINEM FUNKTIONSAUFRUF EINE ZUSÄTZLICHE ;PRÜFUNG ERFOLGEN SOLL, OB HTML VORBEREITET WERDEN SOLL. IST DER RETURNVALUE =1, WIRD HTML NICHT ;VORBEREITET IF $EXTRACT(YEXEC)'="#" IF $EXTRACT(YEXEC)'="*" DO . NEW EXEC,NOHTML,PROG . ;SET PROG=$$^WWWUPER($PIECE($PIECE(YEXEC," ",2),"(",1)) ;Z.B. 'do Gesamt^INAUFBES2(...)' = 'GESAMT^INAUFBES2' . SET PROG=$zconvert($PIECE($PIECE(YEXEC," ",2),"(",1),"U") ;Z.B. 'do Gesamt^INAUFBES2(...)' = 'GESAMT^INAUFBES2' . ;IF $DATA(^WWWCHECKHTML(0,PROG)) DO . IF PROG'="" IF $DATA(^WWWCHECKHTML(0,PROG)) DO ;FIS;09.03.05;27457 . . SET NOHTML=0 . . IF $PIECE($GET(^WWWCHECKHTML(0,PROG,1)),Y,2)=1 QUIT ;HTML IMMER VORBEREITEN ;HTML constantly prepare . . IF $PIECE($GET(^WWWCHECKHTML(0,PROG,1)),Y,1)'="" DO . . . SET EXEC="SET NOHTML="_$PIECE(^WWWCHECKHTML(0,PROG,1),Y,1) ;SR15511 naked ref . . . XECUTE EXEC . . ; . . IF NOHTML=1 SET YEXEC="#"_YEXEC IF ($EXTRACT(YEXEC)="#") || ($EXTRACT(YEXEC)="*") SET YEXEC = $EXTRACT(YEXEC,2,999) DO QUIT ;OHNE HTML VORBEREITUNG ;without HTML preparation . SET $Y=0,$X=0 . IF YEXEC'="" IF '$FIND(YEXEC," ") DO @YEXEC QUIT . IF YEXEC'="" IF $FIND(YEXEC," ") XECUTE YEXEC QUIT ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ DO ^WWWFORMX ;VORGABEN WWW120,WWW012 - generates YVOR and YVOR1 respectively SET YKOPF = $PIECE(YVOR,Y,1) ; $$$WWW120FormHeaderOrImageFile IF YNAME'="" IF YFORM'="" IF YKOPF="" IF $LENGTH(YKOPF)<$LENGTH(YNAME) SET YKOPF = YNAME IF YFORM'="" IF $DATA(^WWW1201(0,YFORM,SPRACHE,1)) SET YKOPF = $PIECE(^WWW1201(0,YFORM,SPRACHE,1),Y,1),YNAME=YKOPF IF YNAME="" SET YNAME = YKOPF DO ^WWWSTART(YKOPF) ;STARTEN HTML ;launching HTML //IF $PIECE($GET(^WWW012(0,YM,1)),Y,31)=7 DO ^WWWFORM8 ;BR014262 if $$GetType^WWWMENU() = 7 { DO ^WWWFORM8 ;JAVASCRIPT WENN MENUE ;when } DO ^WWWBODY(2) ;STARTEN BODY ;launching IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),1) WRITE "" IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),2) WRITE "" IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),3) WRITE "" IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),4) WRITE "" ;vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv DISABLED BLOCK START ;D ;WENN 'ZURUECK' GEWUENSCHT! ;when . WRITE YCR,"
" . WRITE "
" ; "Back" . WRITE "" . WRITE "
" . WRITE "
",YCR ;^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ DISABLED BLOCK END IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,9)="" WRITE "
"        ; $$$WWW120FontFace
	
	;I $D(^$ROUTINE("MASK2")) S YP="HTM" D ^MASK2 S YP(2)=YPAGE,YP(1)=2,YB=".."_YBED
	SET $Y=0,$X=0
	
	;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	;AUSFUEHRUNG
	;  YEXEC = "QUERY,..."  over-ridden by search in D111
	DO   ;
	. IF YEXEC'="" IF $EXTRACT(YEXEC,1,6)="QUERY," DO  QUIT  ;QUERY AUFRUFEN
	. . NEW YCLASS,YQUERY,YPARAX,intYVOR111
	. . SET YCLASS = $PIECE(YEXEC,",",2)
	. . SET YQUERY = $PIECE(YEXEC,",",3)
	. . SET YPARAX = $PIECE(YEXEC,",",4,99)
	. . set intYVOR111 = $FIND($zconvert($piece(YVOR,Y,111),"U"),"SELECT")              ; $$$WWW120QueryForDataFields
	. . IF 'intYVOR111 QUIT:(YCLASS="")||(YQUERY="")                                             ;KEIN QUERY ;no 
	. . IF intYVOR111 SET YQUERY=$TRANSLATE($PIECE(YVOR,Y,111),"|"," ") SET YCLASS="",YPARAX=""  ;MANUELLES QUERY
	. . DO ^WWWQUERY(YCLASS,YQUERY,YPARAX,1)                                                     ;QUERY STARTEN ;launching 
	. ;
	. //IF YEXEC'="" IF '$FIND(YEXEC," ") DO @YEXEC    QUIT  ;DO COMMAND
	. //IF YEXEC'="" IF $FIND(YEXEC," ")  XECUTE YEXEC QUIT  ;EXECUTE
	. ;
	. if $get(YUSER)'="" if $data(^mtempRecordFile("Record",YUSER)) do MacroRecordExecute^WWWRECORD(YM,$g(YUSER),$g(YFORM),$g(YKEY),$g(YEXEC))  ; PPP
	. IF YEXEC'="" IF '$FIND(YEXEC," ") DO @YEXEC do  QUIT  ;DO COMMAND
	. . if $get(YUSER)'="" if $data(^mtempRecordFile("Record",YUSER)) do MacroRecordExecuteStop^WWWRECORD(YM,$g(YUSER))  ; PPP
	. IF YEXEC'="" IF $FIND(YEXEC," ") XECUTE YEXEC do  QUIT  ;EXECUTE
	. . if $get(YUSER)'="" if $data(^mtempRecordFile("Record",YUSER)) do MacroRecordExecuteStop^WWWRECORD(YM,$g(YUSER))  ; PPP
	
	;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
	DO OPEN^WWWSTART
	IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,9)=""       WRITE "
" ; $$$WWW120FontFace IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),1) WRITE "" ; $$$WWW120FontStyle IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),2) WRITE "" IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),3) WRITE "" IF $FIND($PIECE(YVOR,Y,8),4) WRITE "" WRITE "",YCR DO ^WWWSTOP QUIT
